title: Real Madrid players insist head coach Xabi Alonso has their support after Manchester City defeat - The Athletic
snippet: Dec. 10, 2025 ... Real Madrid players have said that they continue to back head coach Xabi Alonso following the teamâ€™s 2-1 Champions League defeat against Manchester City on Wednesday.

title: Inside Real Madrid: Is Xabi Alonso still facing the sack? - The Athletic
snippet: Alonso and his coaching staff ended Wednesdayâ€™s match frustrated. They felt they had missed an opportunity to change the dynamic, but now hope to see more from the team, following signs of an improvement in attitude and football. Those closest to the manager admit that recent weeks have brought a great deal of difficulty and pressure, from inside and outside the club, but they take it in their stride as they expected this when they signed for Madrid.

title: Next Real Madrid manager candidates: Ranking best options to replace Xabi Alonso as coach, including Zidane | Sporting News
snippet: There's almost no chance of Zidane committing to the Real Madrid job long-term given the prospect of taking over France. However, it's entirely possible that Zidane signs on to coach his old club for the rest of the 2025/26 season while he waits ...
